entry.title: Human meaningful witness versioning
entry.summary: In a recent discussion about Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs), Ava Chow clarified a misunderstanding regarding BIP 173, particularly about the bech32 component and its exclusion of the OP_PUSH32 operation. This correction significantly impacts the development direction of BIP 360, leading to a pivotal adjustment where Witness version 2 will be used instead of the initially planned Witness version 3. This change is documented in a pull request on the official GitHub repository for Bitcoin BIPs, which can be reviewed [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1670). This adjustment underscores the dynamic nature of Bitcoin's development process, reflecting how community feedback and clarifications can lead to substantial shifts in technical strategies.
